A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie was not for the fans....s ad because those are the people who invested year's learning and loving each character..above all it was a story of excitement and wonder and obvious wrong and right\, it's not the walking dead where u have to kill a star character just to make people watch..starwars needs to back to its roots of adventure\, romance\,and bad guys who need be vanquished by the hero...just my opinion..may the force be with u ☺
